[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv, dqc_0129.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - D:\Temp\tmp9gho60k6\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0135.9836] The element us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome with a value of 5,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the element us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseIncomeComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the element us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome is included. Because this value uses a statement location axis the enumerated value should also include the appropriate statement location axis. If there is only one statement location axis value the location axis does not have to be used.
If the filing does not disclose the financial statement captions where the amounts appear, an extension element SalesTypeLeaseIncomeComprehensiveIncomeExtensibleListNotDisclosedFlag can be used. If this element is used, the rule will not produce an error.
Concept : us-gaap:SalesTypeLeaseLeaseIncome Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:IncomeStatementLocationAxis=us-gaap:CostOfSalesMember, us-gaap:StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis=adtn:NetworkSolutionsMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9836 Rule version: 20.0.0RC6 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/926282/000095017022002054/adtn-20211231.htm 10479
